strings.Value: "I want to look at your wares."
"Doesn't it bother you that I killed you?"
"Aren't you afraid of enraging the Lantern King by helping me?"

{n}A familiar fey gives you a broad and innocent smile.{/n} "Have I told you how much I admire you? Well, I do! You are followed by catastrophe and trouble everywhere you go — and where there's catastrophe and trouble, there's profits, haha!"

"By the way, how about buying the Complete Collection of Useless Writings? I brought it especially for you!"
{n}Issili winks.{/n}
{n}Issili sighs.{/n} "Just between us, almost every second customer is trying to kill us — just because we're Messengers from Profiteering on Others' Misfortunes!"

"First of all, I'm not helping you. I'm... so to speak, robbing you blind — and not for the first time. Second, it's a question of professional pride. The {g|LanternKing}Lantern King{/g}, I'll have you know, is a patron of the Witchmarket, which is a traveling company that sells anything and everything. In a word, they're my competitors. If you can get the better of their master, I'd be endlessly, immeasurably happy!"
